review:
Dr Gupta is an extremely professional dentist operating in a hygienic pollution free office with state of the art equipment administered by an efficient friendly team / staff  at every level. 
Dr Gupta is very thorough with his prognosis walks you calmly through your options be it treatment or expense. 
Every session he ensures you are medically fit to move to the next stage ensuring minimal discomfort. 
He is very capable humblei and modest and maintains timelines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Ankur Gupta is **** ****** ************* *** supportive. I faced multiple complications during my surgery (root canal filling attached to bone, puss/infection, thick base of root) and Dr Ankur Gupta handled each situation perfectly while also consoling me during the process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was fortunate to see Dr Ankur Gupta at Dentistree. He did an outstanding work by extracting my stubborn, broken wisdom tooth. He did give me local anaesthetic but I am very happy as I had no discomfort throughout procedure and afterwards. I had no swelling on my face. I appreciate his kindness and patience and outcome. The clinic staff is very polite and helpful. Fantastic team work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Ankur Gupta is amazing at his work. He will listen to your problems and will make sure that you are satisfied with the treatments.Dental problems can really be traumatic sometimes but when the doctor makes sure to listen to your experience with the pain,half of the pain just vanishes automatically. Dentistree is a bit on the expensive side but they make sure to do multiple checkups too which balances it.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Never experienced such a painless treatment. No pain killers required from the very next day. Got another wisdom tooth extracted @ Smile & Profile 9 months back.......suffered for more than a month. None other than Dr. Ankur Gupta in case of any dental problem as per me. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
